Key Match Events: The Thunder overcame a 14-point deficit to secure the victory.
Aaron Wiggins knocked down five 3-pointers in the fourth quarter.
Post-Match Reflections: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander led the Thunder in scoring with 33 points and added seven assists.
The Thunder ended the Knicks' winning streak at nine contests.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Oklahoma City led the Knicks 44-5 in points off the bench.
Isaiah Hartenstein faced off against his former team for the first time since leaving in free agency.
Others: The Thunder improved to 29-5 on the season.
The NBA does not count the Thunder's defeat in the NBA Cup final to the Milwaukee Bucks in December as an official loss.
